summary: This is an FBI Mandatory Abuse Reporting form documenting a call received by the FBI's National Threat Operations Center (NTOC) on March 4, 2023. The caller, whose name is redacted, alleges historical child sexual abuse involving Jeffrey Epstein and a person named 'George Epstein', and describes a pattern of harassment and intimidation. The report was drafted for compliance with FBI mandatory abuse reporting policies.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The caller alleges that Jeffrey Epstein was involved in his life and that he and someone named George Epstein took him all over the world. He is a central figure in the abuse allegations.

persons.name: Melissa Gillborn
persons.context: The caller mentions her name in the context of having a lot of traumas. Database queries for her name were conducted but revealed no results.

connections.description: The caller alleges that both Jeffrey Epstein and George Epstein took him all over the world, suggesting they were associates involved in the alleged abuse.

events.title: NTOC Abuse Allegation Call
events.description: At 9:11 p.m. Eastern Time, a caller contacted the FBI's National Threat Operations Center to report allegations of child sexual abuse involving Jeffrey Epstein and George Epstein, and described ongoing harassment.

events.title: Alleged Incident with Girl and Dog
events.description: The caller reports that in 2008, a girl came to his door, later returned with a dog, and an incident occurred where the dog was humping the girl. He was then dragged out of his apartment by a group of people.

keyFacts: A caller reported historical child sexual abuse allegations involving Jeffrey Epstein and an associate named 'George Epstein' to the FBI's NTOC on March 4, 2023.
The caller alleged he was taken 'all over the world' by Jeffrey Epstein and George Epstein, and that 'people who had money' did this to him.
The caller described a pattern of long-term harassment, including being followed by 'gangs and the Mafia', and threats of death and rape if he went to the police.
The FBI conducted database queries for the caller and for a mentioned individual, Melissa Gillborn, as part of their assessment.
The document is a mandatory abuse report, triggering requirements for the receiving FBI field office to complete all mandatory reporting and notifications under state law within 24 hours.
